page.title: 03SHILDON LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: {Shildon Leisure Centre}was built in {1983}alongside the existing{Sunnydale} {Comprehensive}School.Some of the facilities are used by the school during the day.These facilities,which are widely used by the people of Shildon and the surrounding towns, include roller skating, squash, 5-a-side football and badminton, as well as carpet bowls on a huge specially made carpet.There is a gymnastics class each Tuesday from 5pm.to 7pm. There is a weightwatchers class. The cafe and bar sell sweets, drinks and snacks.Near the changing rooms are the suites of sunbeds and saunas.For children there are amusements such as Space invader games and pinball machines.There is a BMX course for bikes,if you don't have one you can hire one.Members of the Centre are not charged for entry.
